mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.major_no AS "majorNo", a.major_name AS "majorName", a.org_id AS "orgId", b.institute_name AS "orgName", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
